page.title: 02CLUBS-N CREAKE
page.content: The village shares all its social clubs with the neighbouring village of S Creake. Those which meet in N Creake Village Hall are the Happy Circle with over 40 senior citizens, and the Youth Club, which has recently been re-formed under new leadership. The 24 members of the Mothers' Union are drawn from the churches of both villages. The Creakes Local History Society has 33 members from the two villages, and has been active over the last 3 years in encouraging interest in many aspects of the area's past. The Women's Institute has 44 members who meet in S Creake. There are no sports clubs in N Creake, but funds are being raised to provide tennis and bowls facilities.
